heisig_chinese_memo: If you want to go hunting, you should train your wild dogs to sniff out mouse hairs first, and then you can teach them to sniff out deer hairs.
Ru_trainchinese: liè: (глаг) охотиться; искать, стремиться к
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: In times past humans were like wild dogs, and had to hunt everything they ate.  No we have farms.
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze text starts with " dog ", "巤" sound, the original meaning is hunting. Because hunting is often accompanied by hounds, it is from " dog ". "Shuowen": "Hunting, letting go of poultry. From the dog, cry."

Bronze inscriptions are used as the original meaning of hunting. Zhongshan Wang Yuanhu: "𤝗猎", that is, "hunting".

The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period were also used as the original meaning, "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Slips. "Qin Law Miscellaneous Copy" Jian 27: "The law of hunting by the company's horse and horse" refers to the law of hunting by the court guard. The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period are often pronounced " hunting " as " sloppy ", "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Slips. Japanese Book A Type" 12zheng -2: "Let's climb high, eat, and sloppy (hunting) in the wild." See " Slutty ".

In Han silk books, the word " La " is pronounced " Hunting ", referring to hunting, "Mawangdui. The 110th line of Laozi Jiaben: "The five colors make people see "blind", and galloping in the field (hunting) makes people crazy." The " La " in the current "Laozi" is " hunting ".

In modern Chinese, " La " has been simplified to " La ", which has a similar meaning, and " Hunt " has also been simplified to " Hunt " (Qiu Xigui), which is a variant of "獡". See " La ".
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The inscription from " dog " and "巤" sound, the original meaning is hunting. Because hunting is often accompanied by hounds, it is from " dog ".
humanum_full_description:
金文從「犬」，「巤」聲，本義是打獵。由於打獵多帶獵犬，故從「犬」。《說文》：「獵，放獵逐禽也。从犬，巤聲。」

　　金文用作本義，指打獵，中山王圓壺：「𤝗獵」，即「畋獵」。

　　戰國竹簡亦用作本義，《睡虎地秦簡．秦律雜抄》簡27：「公車司馬獵律」，指朝廷衛隊狩獵的法律。戰國竹簡常以「邋」讀作「獵」，《睡虎地秦簡．日書甲種》12正-2：「利以登高、飲食、邋(獵)四方野外。」參見「邋」。

　　漢帛書則有以「臘」讀作「獵」，指狩獵，《馬王堆．老子甲本》第110行：「五色使人目明〈盲〉，馳騁田臘(獵)使人心發狂。」今本《老子》「臘」作「獵」。

　　現代漢語由於「臘」被簡化為義近的「腊」，「獵」亦簡化為「獡」的異體字「猎」(裘錫圭)。參見「臘」。
humanum_short_description: 金文從「犬」，「巤」聲，本義是打獵。由於打獵多帶獵犬，故從「犬」。

金文從「 犬 」，「 巤 」聲，本義是打獵。由於打獵多帶獵犬，故從「 犬 」。《說文》：「獵，放獵逐禽也。从犬，巤聲。」 金文用作本義，指打獵，中山王圓壺：「𤝗獵」，即「畋獵」。 戰國竹簡亦用作本義，《睡虎地秦簡．秦律雜抄》簡27：「公車司馬獵律」，指朝廷衛隊狩獵的法律。戰國竹簡常以「 邋 」讀作「 獵 」，《睡虎地秦簡．日書甲種》12正-2：「利以登高、飲食、邋(獵)四方野外。」參見「 邋 」。 漢帛書則有以「 臘 」讀作「 獵 」，指狩獵，《馬王堆．老子甲本》第110行：「五色使人目明〈盲〉，馳騁田臘(獵)使人心發狂。」今本《老子》「 臘 」作「 獵 」。 現代漢語由於「 臘 」被簡化為義近的「 腊 」，「 獵 」亦簡化為「 獡 」的異體字「 猎 」(裘錫圭)。參見「 臘 」。
Bronze text starts with " dog", " 巤" sound, the original meaning is hunting. Because hunting is often accompanied by hounds, it is from " dog". "Shuowen": "Hunting, letting go of poultry. From the dog, cry." Bronze inscriptions are used as the original meaning of hunting. Zhongshan Wang Yuanhu: "𤝗猎", that is, "hunting". The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period were also used as the original meaning, "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Slips. "Qin Law Miscellaneous Copy" Jian 27: "The law of hunting by the company's horse and horse" refers to the law of hunting by the court guard. The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period are often pronounced " hunting" as " sloppy", "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Slips. Japanese Book A Type" 12zheng -2: "Let's climb high, eat, and sloppy (hunting) in the wild." See " Slutty". In Han silk books, the word " La" is pronounced " Hunting", referring to hunting, "Mawangdui. The 110th line of Laozi Jiaben: "The five colors make people see "blind", and galloping in the field (hunting) makes people crazy." The " La" in the current "Laozi" is " hunting". In modern Chinese, " La" has been simplified to " La", which has a similar meaning, and " Hunt" has also been simplified to " Hunt" (Qiu Xigui), which is a variant of " 獡". See " La".

獵字的基本解释

獵
liè
见“猎”。

獵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liè］
［《廣韻》良涉切，入葉，來。］
亦作“獦2”。“猎2”的繁体字。
(1)打猎，捕捉禽兽。
(2)指捕捉（禽兽）。
(3)夺取。
(4)虐待；残害。
(5)经过；掠过。
(6)揽，持。参见“獵纓”。
(7)进攻；进击。
(8)涉猎。
(9)追求；搜求。
(10)《周礼》“六龟”之一。南龟的别称。赤色，后甲较长。
(11)象声词。
(12)通“躐”。践踏。
(13)通“鬛”。鬃毛，亦指髭须。

獵字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　獵； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页720第27
【唐韻】良涉切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】力涉切，?音鬣。【說文】放獵，逐禽也。【廣韻】取獸也。白虎通曰：四時之田，總名爲獵，爲田除害也。尸子曰：虙羲氏之世，天下多獸，故敎人以獵也。【爾雅·釋言】獵，虐也。【疏】獵謂從禽也。必暴害於物，故云。【爾雅·釋天】春獵爲蒐，夏獵爲苗，秋獵爲獮，冬獵爲狩。【詩·魏風】不狩不獵。【禮·王制】豺祭獸，然後田獵。【蔡邕·月令章句】獵者，捷取之名。【正字通】獵以供俎豆，習兵戎，皆國家重事也。　又震也。【吳語】今大夫國子，興其衆庶，以犯獵吳國之師徒。【註】獵，震也。　又【揚雄·校獵賦】鴻絧緁獵。【註】師古曰：緁獵，相差次也。　又龜名。【爾雅·釋魚】龜後弇諸獵。【疏】謂甲後弇覆者名獵。【周禮·春官·龜人】南龜曰獵屬。　又山名。【淮南子·地形訓】洛出獵山。　又車名。【前漢·宣帝紀】太僕以軨獵車奉迎曾孫。【註】文穎曰：軨獵，小車。

考證：〔【前漢·宣帝紀】太僕以軨獵車奉迎龜孫。〕　謹照原文龜
獵字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
獵字的起名意思

暂无。

hunting
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liè］
["Guangyun" Liangshe cuts, enters the leaves, come. ]
Also known as "Rang 2". The traditional characters of "猎2".
(1) Hunting and catching animals.
(2) Refers to capture (animals).
(3) Capture.
(4) Abuse; mutilation.
(5) Passing; passing by.
(6) Lan, hold. See "hunting".
(7) Attack; attack.
(8) Dabble.
(9) Pursuit; search and seek.
(10) One of the "Six Tortoises" in "Zhou Li". Another name for Nangui. Red, with a longer back armour.
(11) Onomatopoeia.
(12) Through "躐". trample.
(13) Through "鬛". Mane, also refers to mustache.
hunting

[Si Ji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　 Hunting; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 720 27
[Tang Yun] Liang She-cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Force She-cut,? Sound. [Said the text] hunting, chasing birds. [Guang Yun] Take the beast. Bai Hutong said: The field of four seasons is called hunting, and it is also for the field to eliminate harm. The corpse said: In the life of the Huixi family, there are many beasts in the world, so it is also a way to teach people to hunt. 【Erya·Interpretation】Hunting, abuse also. [Sparse] Hunting is also called from the birds. It must be violent to things, so cloud. [Erya·Shitian] Hunting in spring is hunting, hunting in summer is seedling, hunting in autumn is hunting, and hunting in winter is hunting. 【Poetry·Weifeng】No hunting, no hunting. [Rite·Royal System] Jackal sacrifices to the beast, and then hunts in the field. 【Cai Yong·Moon Order Chapter】The hunter, named after the victory. 【Zhengzitong】Hunting for peas and practising the military are all important matters of the country.　It is shaking again. [Wuyu] Today, the doctor of the country, prospering his concubines, and hunting the masters and apprentices of the country of Wu for crime. [Note] Hunting, shaking also.　[Yang Xiong·School Hunting Fu] Hung Yau Hunting. [Note] Shi Gu said: There is a difference in hunting.　The name of the tortoise. 【Erya·Shiyu】The queen of the tortoises are all hunting. 【Sparse】The name hunting of the overturner after the first step. 【Zhou Li·Chunguan·Turtleman】South tortoise is said to be the hunter genus.　Also the name of the mountain. [Huainanzi·Training of Terrain] Luo came out of hunting mountains.　Also the name of the car. [Pre-Han·Xuandi Ji] Taipu welcomes his great-grandson with a chariot. [Note] Wen Ying said: 軨hunting, trolley. Textual research: [[Previous Han·Xuandiji] Taipu welcomes the turtle grandson with a chariot. 〕 　 I would like to follow the original turtle
